title: Set up uv workflow
description: Add pyproject.toml, uv.lock and document uv usage in AGENTS.md; add core API deps via uv.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added pyproject.toml and uv.lock, documented uv usage in AGENTS.md, installed FastAPI/uvicorn/pydantic via uv.

title: Add basic local file ingestion copy
description: When dataset source is a local file path, copy it into projects/<id>/data/raw during dataset creation.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Dataset creation now copies local file sources into projects/<id>/data/raw; returns 400 when the file is missing.

title: Scaffold project structure and API skeleton

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Scaffolded initial repo structure with API routes/services/models, added in-memory store and minimal docs placeholders.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added project workspace provisioning and artifact listing endpoint; API now supports GET /projects/{project_id}/artifacts with optional run_id filter.

title: Initialize SvelteKit frontend
description: Replace placeholder web folder with SvelteKit skeleton for the control plane UI.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Initialized SvelteKit minimal TypeScript app in apps/web (no dependency install).

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Focus: implement run execution stub + list runs/artifacts in API and wire UI sections.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Implemented run stub execution with JSON artifact + completed status; wired UI to list runs/artifacts and added artifact download endpoint.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added artifact download endpoint + UI download links, plus optional VITE_API_BASE config for web.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Profile runs now compute basic CSV stats + schema snapshot and UI shows row/column counts.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added delete project/dataset actions in UI and dataset delete API endpoint.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added run selection + artifact preview/download UI with run filter; documented artifacts run_id filter.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Report runs now generate Markdown + HTML artifacts alongside summary JSON.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Each run now emits a simple run_log artifact for preview/download.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: UI shows dataset column names from schema snapshot when available.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added run delete API + UI action with refresh of artifacts/run filter state.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Analysis runs now emit a small CSV preview artifact (analysis_summary).

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: UI now supports creating datasets by source path/URL in addition to uploads.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Run lifecycle now sets status queued -> running -> completed (stub).

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Reports card now shows selected run details.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Artifact list now shows MIME type and size.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Project deletion now removes workspace directory if under repo root.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Run deletion now removes artifact files from the project workspace.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Dataset deletion now removes local file sources under the project workspace.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added artifact type/search filters in Reports card with derived filtered list.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added pytest-based API smoke tests and documented test command.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: API tests now pass; TestClient fixture uses context manager to trigger startup/init_db.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Switched API startup to FastAPI lifespan; warnings cleared.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added dataset detail card showing stats and schema columns.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Datasets list now allows selecting a dataset for detail view.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Tests now cover report runs and report artifact types.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added dataset download endpoint and UI link; dataset sources now stored as workspace file:// paths when copied.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added run type/search filters in Runs card.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added dataset preview + artifact delete endpoints/UI, updated tests and README.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Enhanced run detail summary with artifact counts/types and re-run action in UI.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Report generation now includes sample rows and schema table in Markdown/HTML.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Profiling now captures missing-by-column counts and duplicate row count; UI shows stats in dataset detail.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added list pagination (limit/offset) and uniform error payloads via HTTPException handler.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Extended tests to cover artifact download and run deletion.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: UI now shows latest run status on dataset cards.

title: Fetch projects in frontend landing
description: Call /projects from Svelte landing page and render project list with loading/error states.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Landing page now fetches /projects from the API and renders loading/error/empty states.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added agent runtime skeleton (models, policy, tool router, action journal, snapshot store, runtime loop) and exported from runtime package.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added agent API run endpoints and in-memory agent run service with basic tools (create_run, preview_dataset). Added agent schemas + test coverage.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Persisted agent runs in DB and added agent tools listing endpoint + test coverage.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added list_datasets agent tool and exposed it in the tools list response.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added agent runs listing endpoint with pagination + DB-backed list/count helpers.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added list_project_runs agent tool for safe navigation of run history.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Updated roadmap with explicit progress tracking section for current phase status.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added list_artifacts agent tool and updated roadmap progress; tests pass.

title: Add control plane landing UI placeholder
description: Replace default SvelteKit page with a basic control plane landing layout.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Updated apps/web/src/routes/+page.svelte with a control plane landing layout and styling.

title: Add dataset list and run trigger UI
description: Fetch datasets for selected project, display list, and allow triggering a run for a dataset.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Landing page now fetches datasets for selected project and allows queuing runs for a dataset.

title: Implement snapshot/rollback storage
description: Persist snapshots for agent actions and wire rollback operations for applied steps.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added snapshot persistence model, create_snapshot tool, and snapshots listing endpoint; tests pass.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added rollback request tool, endpoints, and UI wiring; tests pass.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Kickoff v0.2 work: refine control plane UX (pagination, preview table), and plan storage/metadata improvements.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Implemented dataset preview table UI with structured preview data rendering and styling.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added UI pagination controls and wiring for projects, datasets, runs, and artifacts lists.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Updated roadmap next steps to focus on pagination totals now that UI pagination is in place.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Hide pagination controls when only one page is available.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added X-Total-Count pagination headers in API and wired UI to compute hasNext using totals.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Show total counts in pagination controls when available from X-Total-Count headers.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Enhanced artifact preview rendering with HTML iframe support and JSON formatting.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Documented X-Total-Count pagination header in README.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added base styling to generated HTML reports.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Fix pagination count queries to prevent 500s; CORS errors were caused by backend failure.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Updated roadmap: v0.3 dedicated to LLM agents; moved prior v0.3 items to Future improvements.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added inline artifact delete confirmation UI and documented production build commands.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Fixed JSON preview overflow by wrapping and limiting pre blocks.

title: Enable CORS for local frontend
description: Allow Svelte dev server origins to access FastAPI during development.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added CORS middleware allowing http://localhost:5173 and 127.0.0.1:5173 for Svelte dev.

title: Add dataset upload endpoint
description: Support POST /projects/{id}/datasets/upload with multipart file and persist into data/raw.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added /projects/{id}/datasets/upload endpoint and file persistence into data/raw.

title: Persist projects/datasets/runs with SQLModel
description: Replace in-memory store with SQLite persistence using SQLModel; initialize db on startup.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added SQLModel models and SQLite-backed store; init_db runs on startup.

title: Provision per-project workspace folders
description: Create project directory structure (data/raw, data/staging, data/processed, scripts, artifacts, metadata, secrets, env) on project creation.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Project creation now provisions per-project workspace folders under projects/<id> with data/, scripts/, artifacts/, metadata/, secrets/, env/.

title: Add dataset upload UI
description: Add a file upload form to send multipart data to /projects/{id}/datasets/upload for selected project.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added dataset upload form with project selector and multipart POST to /projects/{id}/datasets/upload.

title: Add project creation UI
description: Add a simple form on landing page to create a project via POST /projects and refresh list.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added create-project form on landing page with POST /projects and list refresh.

title: Agent UI wiring for progress + approvals
description: Add UI views for agent runs, step status, approvals, and tool execution results.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Agent runs UI now shows per-step status derived from run logs.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added completion percent and approvals count to agent run step display.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added agent run replay action (POST plan with approvals) and updated roadmap progress.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Replay now prompts for approver name and shows approval-required steps.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added snapshots list section to agent runs UI with pagination.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added rollback request list in agent UI with pagination.

comments.author: Leo Baque
comments.text: Added expandable run log viewer in agent runs UI.
